member_id.description: Unique identifier for the health plan member

subscriber_id.description: Primary subscriber ID for the member
possible_values: Alphanumeric string, matches member_id for primary subscriber

member_type.description: Type of member relationship to subscriber

risk_score.description: Member risk score for care management

_meta.description: Comprehensive healthcare member/enrollee data index following EDI 837/835 standards for member demographics, enrollment information, coverage details, and eligibility status. This index supports member management, eligibility verification, risk stratification, demographic analysis, care management, and population health initiatives across healthcare operations. The index captures complete member lifecycle from enrollment through termination, enabling real-time eligibility verification, demographic reporting, risk assessment, coverage determination, and targeted member communication programs. It integrates with claims and provider data to provide comprehensive member insights for healthcare analytics, fraud detection, and quality improvement initiatives.
